name: Da Tita by Magic Italy - Authentic Italian Restaurant & Pizzeria

reviews.review_text:
One of the best pizzas I have tasted in a long time! Their menu is extensive, offering a wide variety of both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options. We ordered the aubergine pizza, and it tasted heavenly.

The only complaint I have is that the service was slow; we had to repeat our orders to the waiters. We also tried the strawberry gelato, which was quite good as well.

I will definitely visit again when I'm in Goa next time. This place is a must-visit for anyone who loves Italian food, especially pizza.

After visiting the Portuguese House, we decided to grab a bite, and the pizza we had was absolutely amazing! The flavors were spot on, with a perfect balance of toppings and a crispy crust. The place has a calm, laid-back vibe, making it a great spot to relax after exploring. It's very popular with students, and I can see why – the food is fantastic, and the atmosphere is perfect for unwinding. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for great pizza in a chill environment. Definitely a place I’d visit again!

I recently visited Da Tita Italian Restaurant and had a fantastic experience! I ordered two pizzas, including the delicious Four Cheese pizza, which was a perfect blend of flavors.

The Veg Lasagna was rich and comforting, bursting with fresh ingredients. To top it off, I enjoyed a Cosmopolitan cocktail that was expertly crafted.

The atmosphere was warm and inviting, and the service was top-notch. I highly recommend Da Tita for anyone craving authentic Italian cuisine!
